# Import Data
```{r}
# Point Location Dataframe
name <- c("Frost")
lat <- c(29.4268662)
lng <- c(-98.4978473)

point_locations <- data.frame(name  = name,
                  lat = lat,
                  lng = lng)

point_locations_sf <- st_as_sf(point_locations, coords = c(x = "lng",
                                                           y = "lat")
                               )
```


```{r}
# Census Geography
places_sf <- places(state = "48", year =2022)

counties_sf <- counties(state = "48", year = 2022)
bexar_sf <- counties_sf %>% 
  filter(NAME == "Bexar")
tracts_sf <- tracts(state = "48", county = "029")
```
